item.title: nostalgia
item.description:
It is the first post. It is written after I have battled with Hugo for couple hours — I don’t know how to program with GO nor could I write html at all. But I guess it is over. It is finally just me and an empty text editor, and perhaps a long night.

Choosing what language to write my first blog is also hard. I have decided to write both Chinese and English in this very personal blog.
